channel.title: xylem | Gordon Beeming
channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: First post here
item.description: So this is my first post in my new blog which I should be using for quite a bit longer than I Currently have been using my previous blogs on WordPress. I am using a base that was started by Mads Kristensen on GitHub called MiniBlog. I am trying where possible or requested pushing some changes back into the project so that others can also get extra functionality.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Packt Publishing Celebrating 2000 Titles
item.description: Have you heard about the campaign that Packt Publishing is running at the moment? They are celebrating 2000 published titles, below are just 3 of the titles that you can get. For more info see http://bit.ly/1j26nPN.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: One year as ALM Ranger and First day as ALM MVP
item.description: So a year ago today I joined the ALM Rangers family and have recently been "promoted" into an active ALM Ranger and worked on projects like Upgrade Guide, Version Control (ex Branching and Merging) Guide and Flight Plan.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
